p.k: A weekend in and around Toulouse
p.d: A city resolutely facing the future yet still firmly anchored in tradition. Raphaël drops his bags in Toulouse for a weekend. From its historical city centre, to its gastronomy and the Garonne, its famous river, the "pink city" as it is known in France, reveals all its secrets... Presented by: Raphaël de Casabianca.
